definition: to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: Positions continued price stability decreasing, and every higher up the action alone.
sentences.chinese: 價穩持倉量續遞減，多單有逢高回吐動作。

sentences.english: The value of papers declines monotonically after the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 報告的價值在期限後遞減。

sentences.english: Migraines are one of the few neurological disorders to subside with age.
sentences.chinese: 偏頭痛是隨着年齡發作率遞減的神經系統疾病之一。

sentences.english: Diminishing marginal returns are like pickingapples.
sentences.chinese: 邊際收益遞減像摘蘋果。

sentences.english: The first report shows the revenue by product sorted in descending order.
sentences.chinese: 第一個報告按照遞減順序顯示產品收入。

sentences.english: There has been a progressive decrease in population every year in this city.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市的人口在逐年遞減。

sentences.english: The approaches to relieving decline rate in accordance with actual situation were put forward.
sentences.chinese: 結合油田實際，提出了減緩產量遞減率的對策。

sentences.english: Sharp decline in prices drop positions, empty every keyed complement actions alone.
sentences.chinese: 價跌持倉量大幅遞減，空單有逢低迴補動作。

sentences.english: Decrements a specified variable and stores the result, as an atomic operation.
sentences.chinese: 以原子操作的形式遞減指定變量的值並存儲結果。

sentences.english: Golson has discovered the descending law of boundary effect and the maximum law of hedonism.
sentences.chinese: 戈森發現了邊際效用遞減規律和享樂最大化定律。

sentences.english: And, within a column, it decreases down a column.
sentences.chinese: 而且在一列內，它逐次遞減。

sentences.english: Like all other human activities, translation is subject to the law of diminishing returns.
sentences.chinese: 跟其他人類活動一樣，翻譯也是符合收益遞減規律的。

sentences.english: The mass of the laser-ablated substance descends along with increasing the amount of action pulse.
sentences.chinese: 激光燒蝕樣品質量隨着脈衝個數的增加而遞減。

sentences.english: You have five pirates, ranked from 5 to 1 in descending order.
sentences.chinese: 您有五個海盜，排名5到1遞減順序排列。

sentences.english: Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one.
sentences.chinese: 每次轉發數據包時，其“躍點限制”值將遞減一。

sentences.english: The E-filed intensity decays 60 dB per decade of distance from source current. (3).
sentences.chinese: 電場強度隨電流之距離爲三次方遞減。

definition: to increase by degrees/in increasing order/incremental/progressive
turning point/breaking point/inflexion point (math., a point of a curve at which the curvature changes sign)
stuck and not moving forward (idiom); stagnant/in a rut/at a standstill
